00040 GrTexture::GrTexture( const UPath& name, EFORMAT format, unsigned int width, unsigned int height,
00041                                           unsigned int flags )
00042 : GrTextureBase( name, GL_TEXTURE_2D, format, flags, ETT_2D )
00043 , _width( width )
00044 , _height( height )
00045 , _ownedImage( 0 )
00046 , _hwShadowEnable( true )
00047 , _fromFile( false )
00048 , _needSwizzle( true )
00049 , _valid( true )
00050 {
00052         Create();
00053 }

00055 //----------------------------------------------------------
00056 GrTexture::GrTexture( const UPath& name, const UPath& rsrcName, EFORMAT format, unsigned int flags,
00057                                           bool cacheImage )
00058 : GrTextureBase( name, GL_TEXTURE_2D, format, flags, ETT_2D )
00059 , _rsrcPath( rsrcName )
00060 , _width( 1 )
00061 , _height( 1 )
00062 , _ownedImage( 0 )
00063 , _hwShadowEnable( true )
00064 , _fromFile( true )
00065 , _needSwizzle( true )
00066 , _valid( true )
00067 {
00068         if ( cacheImage )
00069         {
00070                 _ownedImage = LoadImg();
00071                 if ( _ownedImage )
00072                 {
00073                         _width = _ownedImage->GetWidth();
00074                         _height = _ownedImage->GetHeight();
00075                 }
00076         }
00077 
00078         Create();
00079 }
00080 
00081 //----------------------------------------------------------
00082 GrTexture::GrTexture( const UPath& name, GrImage* image, EFORMAT format, unsigned int flags )
00083 : GrTextureBase( name, GL_TEXTURE_2D, format, flags, ETT_2D )
00084 , _width( 1 )
00085 , _height( 1 )
00086 , _ownedImage( image )
00087 , _hwShadowEnable( true )
00088 , _fromFile( false )
00089 , _needSwizzle( true )
00090 , _valid( true )
00091 {
00092         if ( image != 0 )
00093         {
00094                 _width = image->GetWidth();
00095                 _height = image->GetHeight();
00096         }
00097         Create();
00098 }

00111 //----------------------------------------------------------
00112 void
00113 GrTexture::OwnedImageChanged()
00114 {
00116         B_ASSERT( _ownedImage != 0 );
00117 
00119         Bind( 0 );
00120         UploadImage( ( GetFlags() & kNoMipMap ) == 0 );
00121 }

00123 //----------------------------------------------------------
00124 void
00125 GrTexture::SetHWShadowEnable( bool enable )
00126 {
00128         if ( GetFormat() != EF_DEPTH && GetFormat() != EF_DEPTHSTENCIL )
00129         {
00131                 B_ASSERT( false );
00132                 return;
00133         }
00134 
00135         if ( _hwShadowEnable != enable )
00136         {
00137                 if ( enable )
00138                         bglTexParameteri( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_COMPARE_MODE_ARB, GL_COMPARE_R_TO_TEXTURE_ARB );
00139                 else
00140                         bglTexParameteri( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_COMPARE_MODE_ARB, GL_NONE );
00141         }
00142         _hwShadowEnable = enable;
00143 }
00144 
00145 //----------------------------------------------------------
00146 void
00147 GrTexture::BindToFramebuffer( unsigned int attachment )
00148 {
00149         CHECK_GL();
00150 
00151         B_ASSERT( GetTexHandle() != 0 );
00152         bglFramebufferTexture2DEXT( GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, attachment, GL_TEXTURE_2D, GetTexHandle(), 0 );
00153         CHECK_GL();
00154 }

00156 //----------------------------------------------------------
00157 void
00158 GrTexture::UploadPixelData( int dstLevel, int dstX, int dstY, int width, int height, const void* srcPels,
00159                                                         GLenum srcFormat, GLenum srcType )
00160 {
00164         B_ASSERT( GetFormat() != EF_DXT1 && GetFormat() != EF_DXT5 && GetFormat() != EF_DXT5R );
00165         B_ASSERT( GetGLFormat( 0 ) != GL_COMPRESSED_RGB_S3TC_DXT1_EXT );
00166         B_ASSERT( GetGLFormat( 0 ) != GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_S3TC_DXT5_EXT );
00167         B_ASSERT( GetGLFormat( 0 ) != GL_COMPRESSED_RED_RGTC1 );
00168 
00170         Bind( 0 );
00171         bglTexSubImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, dstLevel, dstX, dstY, width, height, srcFormat, srcType, srcPels );
00172         CHECK_GL();
00173 }
00174 
00175 //----------------------------------------------------------
00176 void
00177 GrTexture::UploadPixelDataCompressed( int dstLevel, int dstX, int dstY, int width, int height, const void* srcPels,
00178                                                                           GLenum srcFormat, unsigned int srcDataSize )
00179 {
00180         B_ASSERT( GetFormat() == EF_DXT1 || GetFormat() == EF_DXT5 || GetFormat() == EF_DXT5R );
00181         B_ASSERT( GetGLFormat( 0 ) == GL_COMPRESSED_RGB_S3TC_DXT1_EXT || 
00182                           GetGLFormat( 0 ) == GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_S3TC_DXT5_EXT || 
00183                           GetGLFormat( 0 ) == GL_COMPRESSED_RED_RGTC1 );
00184 
00186         Bind( 0 );
00187         bglCompressedTexSubImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, dstLevel, dstX, dstY, width, height, srcFormat, srcDataSize, srcPels );
00188         CHECK_GL();
00189 }

00191 //----------------------------------------------------------
00192 void
00193 GrTexture::DebugSave( const char* fileName )
00194 {
00196         Bind( 0 );
00197         char* pels = new char[ _width * _height * 4 ];
00198         bglGetTexImage( GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_BGRA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, pels );
00199         GrSaveTGA( fileName, pels, _width, _height, 4 );
00200         delete[] pels;
00201 }

00208 //----------------------------------------------------------
00209 void
00210 GrTexture::UploadImage( bool mipmap )
00211 {
00213         CHECK_GL();
00214 
00216         B_ASSERT( GetTexHandle() != 0 );
00217 
00219         GrImage* image = 0;
00220         if ( _ownedImage != 0 )
00221         {
00222                 image = _ownedImage;
00223         }
00224         else if ( _fromFile )
00225         {
00226                 image = LoadImg();
00227                 B_ASSERT( image != 0 );
00228                 if ( image == 0 )
00229                         HandleError( "%s, line %d:\n\nError loading image '%s'!", __FILE__, __LINE__, _rsrcPath.GetPathString().c_str() );
00230 
00231                 _width = image->GetWidth();
00232                 _height = image->GetHeight();
00233         }
00234 
00235         if ( ( GetFormat() == EF_DEPTH || GetFormat() == EF_DEPTHSTENCIL ) && _hwShadowEnable )
00236         {
00238                 if ( _hwShadowEnable )
00239                         bglTexParameteri( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_COMPARE_MODE_ARB, GL_COMPARE_R_TO_TEXTURE );
00240                 else
00241                         bglTexParameteri( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_COMPARE_MODE_ARB, GL_NONE );
00242                 bglTexParameteri( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_COMPARE_FUNC_ARB, GL_LEQUAL );
00243                 bglTexParameteri( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_DEPTH_TEXTURE_MODE_ARB, GL_LUMINANCE );
00244         }
00245 
00247         unsigned int internalFormat = GetGLFormat( image );
00248 
00250         if ( image != 0 )
00251         {
00253                 if ( !IsPow2( _width ) || !IsPow2( _height ) )
00254                 {
00255                         B_ERROR( "Unsupported texture image: dimensions must be a power of 2." );
00256                 }
00257 
00260                 bool isNormalMap = false;
00261                 EFORMAT format = GetFormat();
00262                 if ( format == EF_A8 || format == EF_L8 )
00263                         image->ConvertToI8();
00264                 else if ( format == EF_LA16 )
00265                 {
00266                         if ( image->GetFormat() == GrImage::EF_BGRA32 )
00267                                 image->ConvertToLA16();
00268                         else if ( image->GetFormat() == GrImage::EF_BGR24 )
00269                                 image->ConvertToI8();
00270                 }
00271                 else if ( format == EF_NORMALMAP || format == EF_HIGHDEFNORMALMAP )
00272                         isNormalMap = true;
00273 
00275                 unsigned int baseMipLevel = 0;
00276                 if ( mipmap )
00277                 {
00278                         if ( image->GetWidth() > 128 && image->GetHeight() > 128 )
00279                                 baseMipLevel = _baseMipLevel[ gGrTextureMgr->GetTexturingQuality() ];
00280 
00282                         if ( isNormalMap )
00283                         {
00284                                 image->GenMipMaps( isNormalMap );
00285                         }
00286                         else
00287                         {
00288 #if AUTO_GEN_MIPMAPS
00291                                 bglTexParameteri( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP_SGIS, GL_TRUE );
00292 #else
00293                                 image->GenMipMaps( false );
00294 #endif
00295                         }
00296                 }
00297 
00299                 if ( isNormalMap && ( !_ownedImage || _needSwizzle ) )
00300                 {
00301                         image->SwizzleToBXRG();
00302                         _needSwizzle = false;
00303                 }
00304 
00306 #if 0
00308                 if ( _ownedImage == 0 )
00309                 {
00310                         if ( internalFormat == GL_COMPRESSED_RGB_S3TC_DXT1_EXT )
00311                                 image->CompressDXT1( isNormalMap );
00312                         else if ( internalFormat == GL_COMPRESSED_RGBA_S3TC_DXT5_EXT )
00313                                 image->CompressDXT5( isNormalMap );
00314                 }
00315 #endif
00316 
00318 #if AUTO_GEN_MIPMAPS
00319                 if ( WasCreated() )
00320                         image->TexSubImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, internalFormat, baseMipLevel, isNormalMap ? 0 : 1, isNormalMap );
00321                 else
00322                         image->TexImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, internalFormat, baseMipLevel, isNormalMap ? 0 : 1, isNormalMap );
00323 #else
00325                 if ( image->IsCompressed() )
00326                 {
00327                         image->CompressedTexImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, internalFormat, baseMipLevel, 0, isNormalMap );
00328                 }
00329                 else
00330                 {
00331                         if ( WasCreated() )
00332                                 image->TexSubImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, internalFormat, baseMipLevel, 0, isNormalMap );
00333                         else
00334                                 image->TexImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, internalFormat, baseMipLevel, 0, isNormalMap );
00335                 }
00336 #endif
00337                 CHECK_GL();
00338         }
00339         else
00340         {
00341                 unsigned int dataFmt = ( ( GetFormat() == EF_DEPTH || GetFormat() == EF_DEPTHSTENCIL ) ? GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT : GL_RGBA );
00342                 if ( mipmap )
00343                 {
00346                         bglTexParameteri( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_GENERATE_MIPMAP_SGIS, GL_TRUE );
00347 
00348                         unsigned int mipLevel = 0;
00349                         unsigned int mipWidth = _width;
00350                         unsigned int mipHeight = _height;
00351                         while ( mipWidth > 0 || mipHeight > 0 )
00352                         {
00353                                 mipWidth = Max( mipWidth, 1U );
00354                                 mipHeight = Max( mipHeight, 1U );
00355                                 bglTexImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, mipLevel, internalFormat, mipWidth, mipHeight, 0, dataFmt, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, 0 );
00356                                 CHECK_GL();
00357                                 mipWidth >>= 1;
00358                                 mipHeight >>= 1;
00359                                 ++mipLevel;
00360                         }
00361                 }
00362                 else
00363                 {
00364                         bglTexImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, internalFormat, _width, _height, 0, dataFmt, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, 0 );
00365                         CHECK_GL();
00366                 }
00367         }
00368 
00370         if ( !_ownedImage && _fromFile )
00371                 delete image;
00372 }
